downloadTitle: SharePoint 2010 Products backup and recovery planning workbook
downloadDescription: Workbook to help you plan your backup and recovery strategy for SharePoint 2010 Products
detailsSection:
Use this workbook to identify what you plan to back up, to ensure that you have all the information that you need before you implement a backup strategy.

Fill out the "Requirements and Decisions" worksheet to get a complete understanding of the servers, service applications, and Web applications in your environment.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page.
  2. Save the file to your hard disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
